content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of a furnace entity used to process iron ore into iron plates. This structure supports the production of intermediate components and supplies the resources needed for higher-tier crafting.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of a furnace entity dedicated to turning harvested copper ore into copper plates. These copper plates are subsequently used for crafting copper cables and other copper-based components.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• When calling get_entities, avoid using keyword arguments (e.g. "radius") or supplying a mismatched number of positional arguments. Always verify the expected signature to prevent TypeErrors.
• Ensure that the return value from get_entities is valid and iterable before processing it. Use an empty list fallback if the function returns None.
• Before attempting to place any structure (such as a Lab), confirm that the required item exists in inventory to avoid placement errors.
• When crafting complex structures like a Lab, verify that all sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are sufficiently available. Strengthen upstream production lines to meet these requirements.
• Address recurring crafting failures by closely managing resource production and intermediate component supply to ultimately satisfy the recipe demands.
